snippet: The plan, which could go into effect early next year, would end what is seen as one of the last discriminatory rules about who can enlist or be commissioned in the military.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter announces that Pentagon is working on plan that would allow transgender people to serve openly in military.
lead_paragraph: The plan, which could go into effect early next year, would end what is seen as one of the last discriminatory rules about who can enlist or be commissioned in the military.

headline.main: Pentagon Moves to Allow Transgender People to Serve Openly in the Military
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Moves to Allow Transgender People to Serve Openly in the Military

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
